note:
Old, very old...in the background of my avatar, you can see the exact middle of nowhere where I grew up.

(I had copied some political slogans from fedi campaigns I supported. I still support them, but the slogans may have lost their context, so I deleted them. May add more as they appeal to me. In general, I am anti-capitalist, pro-woke, and think Fedi can help organize a better economic system.)
